li.label: ate bland meal
li.description: I had to eat a rather bland meal. I know it keeps you alive, but it also bores you silly.

li.label: failed to reclaim hold
li.description: We failed to reclaim our captured hold. It's a real shame to have not succeeded.

li.label: fighting for lost hold
li.description: We are fighting to reclaim our lost hold!

li.label: reclaimed lost hold
li.description: We reclaimed our captured hold. A great grudge has been removed, and we have our ancestral hall back.

li.label: Became {HIGHBLOOD}
li.description: I was crowned {HIGHBLOOD}. The clans have recognized me as worthy of ruling.

li.label: Thane died
li.description: A thane died. What a horrible day for the clans.

li.label: King or Queen died
li.description: Our great leader has died. There must be a grudge that we can create and avenge from this. Great woe for all the clans.

li.label: ate commoner food
li.description: That meal was below me. My high blood requirements should always be respected.

li.label: undignified high blood seat
li.description: I am a {HIGHBLOOD}, and it's only appropriate that my high blood seat has the following:\n\n{0}

li.label: undignified bedroom
li.description: A {HIGHBLOOD} should have appropriate sleeping quarters. My bedroom should have these:\n\n{0}

li.label: no high blood room
li.description: What is a high blood with no appropriate room to rule from?

li.label: need my own bedroom
li.description: A {HIGHBLOOD} should not be sharing a sleeping space with the clans.

li.label: thane on map
li.description: There's a thane here, it's great to be well led, and confident that things are being properly taken care of.

li.label: king on map
li.description: There's a king here. Everything is in well in order, and being handled in a proper dwarfen fashion.

li.label: we have a new thane
li.description: We have a new thane! Glory to the clans.

li.label: we have a new king
li.description: A new dwarfen king has been crowned! Glory to the clans.

li.label: ruled from awful room
li.description: I ruled from an awful room. It's unbecoming of us as dwarfs

li.label: ruled from lackluster room
li.description: I ruled from a dull room. As dwarfs, we can do better.

li.label: ruled from mediocre room
li.description: I ruled from a mediocre room. It makes us look bad as a people.

li.label: ruled from very impressive room
li.description: I ruled from a very impressive room. As dwarfs, we've done well to make it very presentable.

li.label: ruled from extremely impressive room
li.description: I ruled from an extremely impressive room. It shines, and all the clans should be proud.

li.label: ruled from unbelievably impressive room
li.description: I ruled from an unbelievably impressive room. The clans have out done themselves in making it thus.

li.label: ruled from wondrously impressive room
li.description: I ruled from a heavenly room. It is a source of pride for all the clans I rule.

li.label: high blood court awful
li.description: That high blood court was terrible. They have no plan on where we're going as a people, and they don't seem likely to figure one out any time soon.

li.label: high blood court boring
li.description: The high blood court was just boring. The high bloods really should step it up a bit.

li.label: high blood court ok
li.description: The high blood court was good. I feel good about the high bloods that rule here.

li.label: high blood court great
li.description: The high blood court was great. Many grudges were laid out, and plans are being made on how to handle them. The high bloods are great here!

li.label: listening to horn
li.description: The horn gives me comfort, and faith in dawi-kind.
